channel.title: Lots of monster colours
channel.description:
I am getting pretty confused. When setting up a autofighter, what color shall i have where? Example:
monstercolor1 = x monstercolor2 = x monstercolor3 = x
Some1 please tell me.

item.title: Lots of monster colours
item.dc:creator: @Hex_Key Hex Key
item.description:
@Hex_Key wrote:

monster colour one is most likely used the most oftne, so amke that colour a highly abundant colour on the monster but al unique to the monster (so not brown or black)

Read full topic
